message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. Considering the product's value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My revised offer is $1200000, but I'm willing to go up to $1250000 if you're willing to meet me in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1100000, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. Can you consider meeting me at $1150000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1200000. Considering you're willing to go up to $1150000, I'm willing to meet you at $1225000. I'm willing to make a slight concession to keep the deal moving forward.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1125000, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. Can you consider meeting me at $1140000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to see some movement from you. I'll meet you at $1200000, but I'm not going any lower. If you're willing to meet me there, I'm willing to consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1180000, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. Can you consider meeting me at $1190000?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, but I need you to meet me halfway from your last offer. I'll give you a slight discount, and I'll meet you at $1185000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1170000, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll meet you at $1177500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
